title: RA Sushi serves cocktails with Japanese-inspired names and ingredients
statement: RA Sushi offers cocktails with Japanese-themed names like Blushing Geisha, Japanese Mule, and Blue Samurai, incorporating Japanese ingredients like sake, yuzu, and shiso.

citations.quote: JAPANESE MULE Absolut Citron Vodka mixed with Nigori Cr√®me de Sake fresh lime and Q Ginger Beer
